title: Instructional Design Strategies to Improve Pakistani University Faculty Teaching Perceptions

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic curriculum design and evaluation methods
context.additional_context: Most learners are adult citizens with field-based educational experience, interested in diagnosing and improving their instructional competencies through case analysis of Pakistan

learning_goals: Able to conduct a structural analysis of teaching method perception factors (evaluation systems, learning activities, teaching strategies) at Pakistani universities
Able to explain methods for diagnosing the level of teaching method perception using survey design and factor analysis techniques
A instructional design framework can be developed that shifts away from assessment-centered education and proposes strategies for cultivating transferable competencies
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
